name: The Fallen Prince
description:
You were once the prince of the kingdom. You were once, loved. You were once, the heir.

Your brother, father and yourself always got along well, yet when they found out that you practiced dark magic, which did no harm to anyone as it is your casual hobby, everyone turned on you. Your father, your brother…the whole kingdom…

Alone and exiled with noone to rely on you must find a way to regain your rightful place. The kingdom will follow you, in this life or the next…

It is time to become the ruler of a kingdom of bones and dust
